topic.para: In case you experience a problem that is not covered in this guide, post it on syslog-ng mailing list.
Product support, including 7x24 online support is available in various packages. For support options, visit the following page.
If you have a valid Support Service Agreement, you can &contact-support;. Online support is available 24 hours a day for registered users with a valid support package.
Support hotline: +36 1 398 6700 (available from 9 AM to 5 PM CET on weekdays).
